mapper.select: select r.record_id,r.sign_time,s.stu_name,s.stu_school,s.stu_subject,s.stu_phone,i.item_name,i.address,i.join_time,i.act_profile FROM record r INNER JOIN stu_info s ON r.user_id = s.uid INNER JOIN item_info i ON r.item_id = i.item_id where r.org_id = #{org_id} and r.item_id = #{item_id} and r.record_check = #{check_status} ORDER BY sign_time ASC

select r.record_id,r.sign_time,s.stu_name,s.stu_school,s.stu_subject,s.stu_phone,i.item_name,i.address,i.join_time,i.act_profile FROM record r INNER JOIN stu_info s ON r.user_id = s.uid INNER JOIN item_info i ON r.item_id = i.item_id where r.org_id = #{org_id} and r.item_id = #{item_id} and r.record_check = #{check_status} ORDER BY sign_time DESC

select r.record_id,r.record_check,s.stu_name,s.stu_school,s.stu_subject,s.stu_phone,i.item_name,i.address,i.join_time,i.act_profile FROM record r INNER JOIN stu_info s ON r.user_id = s.uid INNER JOIN item_info i ON r.item_id = i.item_id where r.record_check = 0 and r.org_id = #{org_id}
mapper.update: update item_info set present_num = present_num + 1 where item_id in (select item_id from record where record_id = #{record_id})
